CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV tells MOT about warm-up task and leaves the room
MOT walks across the room to the coathooks on the wall
CHI walks across the room and puts her hands on the cushion of a chair
<bef> CHI pulls on the chair cushion . CHI leans on cushion with both hands . <aft> CHI walks over to the chair at the table and climbs into it

sits in the chair next to the door

CHI continues walking across the room

< .1u> CHI pulls herself into the chair and turns herself around in the chair

<bef> CHI tries to push the clown inside the jack+in+the+box

CHI picks up the jack+in+the+box and brings it to MOT
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box and puts it on her lap then starts to turn the handle
CHI stops MOT by her yell and starts to turn the handle of the jack+in+the box while MOT holds it on her lap
CHI places her left hand on the top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box with her right hand
CHI stops turning the handle and tries to open the box
MOT gently pushes CHI's hand away
CHI takes her hand off the top of the box and points to the picture of the clown on the box
<bef> CHI turns the handle briefly . CHI turns the jack+in+the+box towards MOT so that she will turn it
<bef> CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box for about one second before it pops . <aft> CHI puts her thumbs on the eyes of the clown
CHI moves her hands further down on the clown's face
MOT bounces her knees up and down so that the eyes appear to move
<3-4> MOT bounces her finger up and down on the clown's head
CHI taps the clown's head lightly with her finger
CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI looks back at the clown
<3-4> MOT taps the clown with her finger
MOT taps the clown with her finger again
<aft> CHI pushes on the clown's head
MOT taps the clown's head with her finger . <aft> MOT examines her fingernail
<aft> CHI makes waving motions using both hands around the clown's head
CHI pushes the clown back in the box and tries to close the cover
the clown comes out of the box
<aft> CHI uses one hand to put the clown in the box and the other hand to try to close the cover of the box .
CHI stomps her feet in frustration
MOT pushes down the cover of the box
MOT pushes the cover down again
<bef> CHI pushes on the cover of the box also
MOT turns the box back to face CHI

<bef> CHI puts one hand on the cover of the box and turns the handle for approximately three seconds with the other hand . CHI stops turning the handle . <aft> CHI turns the jack+in+the+box to face MOT

MOT leans forwards in her chair

CHI starts pushing the clown back in the box
CHI tries to push down the cover of the box
MOT reaches down to help CHI close the top of the box

<bef> MOT sits back in her chair

CHI is focussed on the duck but gazes briefly at MOT then looks up at the door
INV enters then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 10:54:35
INV comes in and has MOT sit next to CHI at the table as she explains the Forbidden Object task . INV takes the other toys off of the table . INV lets CHI keep the slinky
throughout the entire task CHI has her hand on the slinky that is on the table
INV takes the object out of the drawer and puts it on the table . INV sets the object in motion

<bef> CHI watched INV closely as she followed INV's motions to drawer with her eyes . CHI opens here mouth wide as soon as the object is set on the table and blinks her eyes rapidly as the object is set in motion
<bef> CHI watches object . CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI looks at INV
<bef> CHI looks down at her lap and at beads . CHI looks at MOT
<bef> CHI pulls at the toy beads around her neck
CHI turns toward INV and smiles
INV removes the object from the table and also takes the slinky from CHI . INV tells MOT about the Parent Child Interaction Boxes
10:56:29 INV leaves the room . MOT goes immediately over to the desk and CHI gets herself out of the chair
